Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Tile.Building

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Tile.Building
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Enclosing class:
Tile
public static class Tile.Building
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Class used to model the tower. There are two internal variables one to keep the height of the tower in memory the other to know if there is a dome. The complete towers consist of three blocks and a dome.
See Also:
